original: Ekström, Gustaf Emanuel, direktör, ingenjör, Nässjö, f. 19/3/94 i Nässjö av Carl E. o. Emma Jonsson. G. 26 m. Inez Sundberg. Barn: Lars f. 27, Per 30, Marianne 34, Ingrid 43. — Ing:ex. v. CTI (V) 17. Anst. v. stadsing :kont. i Trollhättan 17-18, v. Smålands Kraft A-B i Nässjö sed. 18, driftsing. där 20, verkst. dir. sed. 39. Led. av stadsfullm. o. drätselkamm. i Nässjö. Led. av Sv. tekn:fören. sed. 26. Småil. idr :förb. förtj :M 23, Nässjö sim- o. livräddn :,sällsk. förtj :M 33, Nässjö IF förtj :M 37.
translated: Ekström, Gustaf Emanuel, director, engineer, Nässjö, b. March 19, 1894 in Nässjö to Carl E. and Emma Jonsson. Married Inez Sundberg in 1926. Children: Lars b. 1927, Per b. 1930, Marianne b. 1934, Ingrid b. 1943. Graduated with a degree in engineering from the Royal Institute of Technology (stockholm) in 1917. Employed at the municipal engineering office in Trollhättan from 1917-1918, and at Smålands Kraft A-B in Nässjö since 1918, as a plant engineer since 1920 and as managing director since 1939. Member of the city council and the finance committee in Nässjö. Member of the Swedish Technical Association since 1926. Awarded the Medal of Merit by Småland's Sports Association in 1923, by the Nässjö Swimming and Lifesaving Association in 1933, and by the Nässjö IF in 1937.
